name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Detail-oriented Entry-Level Engineer with a strong foundation in **Python**, **SQL**, and **JavaScript**. Proficient in **TypeScript** and experienced in developing applications within **PostgreSQL** environments. Solid understanding of both frontend and backend web development, complemented by knowledge of **Git** for version control, and proficient in Linux for system operations. Equipped with skills in data analysis, machine learning, and APIs, with a passion for leveraging technology to solve problems. With over 9 years of experience as a .NET Full Stack Developer, I bring expertise in microservices architecture and distributed systems, along with familiarity in **Apache Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Redis**. Recognized for delivering robust solutions, streamlining development processes, and enhancing performance through collaborative teamwork and leadership on projects.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed and maintained efficient web applications leveraging **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** to enhance the functionality and responsiveness of the user interface.
• Engaged in **Data Analysis** utilizing tools and frameworks to derive actionable insights from user data.
• Managed database interactions with **PostgreSQL** and **SQL**, optimizing performance and ensuring data integrity.
• Collaborated in **Backend Web Development** to design RESTful APIs, ensuring seamless integration between the frontend and backend.
• Employed **Git** for version control to facilitate collaboration and maintain code integrity across teams.
• Contributed to the creation of user-centric applications through effective **Frontend Web Development** practices, enhancing overall user experience.
• Applied knowledge of **Data Mining** and **Data Modeling** to structure and analyze data effectively, empowering informed decision-making.
• Gained proficiency in **Linux** environments to support application deployment and maintenance workflows.
• Leveraged **Machine Learning** techniques to implement predictive analytics features, improving user engagement metrics by up to **20%**.
• Participated in cross-functional teams to strategize and execute software solutions, adhering to project deadlines and standards.
